tool_purpose: Calculates the concrete volume required for a rectangular concrete slab.

inputs.label: Slab Length
inputs.explanation: The total length of the slab measured from end to end.

inputs.label: Slab Width
inputs.explanation: The total width of the slab measured side to side.

inputs.label: Slab Thickness
inputs.explanation: The thickness of the slab. A common residential thickness is 4 inches.

outputs.label: Concrete Volume
outputs.description: Total volume of concrete required for the slab in cubic feet.

outputs.label: Concrete Volume
outputs.description: Total volume of concrete required for the slab in cubic yards.

assumptions: No waste or overage is included.

seo.meta_description: Calculate the concrete volume needed for a rectangular slab based on length, width, and thickness.

tool_notes.title: How this calculator works
tool_notes.text: This calculator multiplies the slab length, width, and thickness to determine the total concrete volume required.

tool_notes.title: When to use this calculator
tool_notes.text: Use this calculator when planning concrete slabs for patios, driveways, floors, or similar flat surfaces.
